products.title: Iphone X
products.description: El nuevo iPhone X es todo pantalla. Tiene Face ID, que convierte tu cara en tu contraseña, y el chip más potente usado en un smartphone hasta ahora.

products.title: Smartphone Android
products.description: Ask it questions. Tell it to do things. It's your own personal Google, always ready to help. To get help from your Assistant, say Ok Google or touch and hold the Home button.

products.title: Keyone X-2
products.description: With Google's intelligence built in, Android brings you useful insights and assistance to help you do the things you love.

products.title: Totoro Xyz-323
products.description: With Google's intelligence built in, Android brings you useful insights and assistance to help you do the things you love.
